main.name: Victor Banerjee
main.description: I'm a computational biologist. Currently working in Genome India Project at Center of Cellular and Molecular Biology (CCMB Hydrabad)
main.bio: I am an experienced bioinformatics and genomics researcher who has contributed to multiple projects. I developing a comprehensive database for G-quadruplex DNA sequences, as well as a deep learning model for single-cell RNA cell type prediction. Additionally, I contributed to the Genome India Project, where I assisted in building pipelines for the cluster using Snakemake. My expertise includes NGS pipeline, Snakemake, data analysis, and statistical analysis. I have a proven track record of successfully contributing to cutting-edge research projects in the field of genomics and bioinformatics.

resume.skillmessage: Following are the popular skill I have acquired through the various parts of my experience

education.description: Completed the Post graduation in Microbiology
I learn everything about computer by myself.

work.company: CSIR - Center of Cellular and Molecular Biology,Bhubaneshwar
work.title: Project Associate
work.description: Working as a Project associate in the prestigious Genome India Project. I am currently developing database for different patterns within the genomes. Understanding the relationship of various disease model in Indian Populations.

work.company: National Institute of Science Education and Research
work.title: Junior Research Fellow
work.description: Work as a Research Fellow to understand the host-pathogen interaction between Drosophila melanogaster and Pseudomonas aeruginosa. The goal of the project to establish an infection model for Drosophila and pathogen and understand the resistance of bacteria in the presence of agent Triclosan.

projects.title: ML/AI & Data Science
projects.category: AI, Machine Learning and Deep Learning
